description: A 6-inch (or about 15 cm) long piece of natural cordage.  Useful for some purposes, but not as strong or flexible as proper string.
A 3-foot (or about 90 cm) long piece of natural cordage.  Useful for some purposes, but not as strong or flexible as proper string.
A 6-inch (or about 15 cm) long piece of cotton string.
A 3-foot (or about 90 cm) long piece of cotton string.
A 6-foot (or about 180 cm) long piece of rope.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

pocket_data.//: Universal pocket, can store almost anything sans liquid, at the price of high move and encumbrance cost.

use_action.holster_msg: You use an elaborate knot to tie your %s to your %s

description: A 30-foot (or about 9 m) long rope.  Useful for keeping yourself safe from falls.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

pocket_data.//: Universal pocket, can store almost anything sans liquid and very small items, at the price of high move and encumbrance cost.

description: A sturdy 6-foot (or about 180 cm) long vine.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

A sturdy 30-foot (or about 9 m) long vine.  Could easily be used as a rope.  Strong enough to suspend a large corpse for butchering.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

A 6-foot (or about 180 cm) long piece of rough rope, woven from natural cordage.  Useful for some purposes, but not as strong or flexible as proper rope.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

A 30-foot (or about 9 m) long rough rope, woven from natural cordage.  Not strong enough to hold up to falls, but still useful for some things, such as suspending large corpses for butchering.  Wear it over a shoulder and tie items to it as a temporary carrying solution.

name: fibrous stalk
description: A rather green stick.  Very fibrous.
